example_usage.description: Example of how to use OIDC authentication with Snowflake extension
steps: 1. Configure your Okta application with the redirect URI
2. Set the OIDC configuration parameters above
3. Use the extension with OIDC auth type
4. The extension will guide you through the OIDC flow

security_notes: PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange) is used for security
Authorization code is exchanged for tokens securely
Tokens are used for Snowflake authentication
